reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks like a designer piece and appreciate its good quality, comfortable fit, and reasonable price. Moreover, the fabric receives positive feedback, and customers consider it perfect for baby showers. However, several customers report issues with the off-the-shoulder design not staying in place. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering
items.body: Beautiful! What a lovely dress. Nice fabric. Rich color. I’m 5’6” 160lb. I went with the L and the fit is great. Over 50 and had twins, so I have a momma pouch. With that, I will be wearing shape wear to camouflage my reality. It’s a flattering dress. Cant wait to wear it. Read more
items.author: Tamara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for baby shower
items.body: Loooved this dress. Wore it for baby shower and got lots of compliments! It was comfy and stretchy enough to fit the bump! Wore nude undies but did not feel like it was see through. It does have a slip underneath! The neck/sleeve area would not completely stay down to give the off the shoulder look, but still looked fine and I didn’t really care. 33 weeks pregnant. Height: 5’6” Weight: 160 ish Size: M Read more
items.author: Brittany Ivins

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: really cute dress fit nicely. They just sent me the wrong color. I ordered blue and they sent me red. other than that no complaints. would order again. Read more
items.author: Renae

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!!
items.body: True to size! Love how it fit. Tummy control! And great quality! Wish there was one in white!! Read more
items.author: Absolutely love these banners so cute with the lights but even cute when lights not on!!! Will be buying again

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!!
items.body: Got so many compliments all night with this dress. There’s stretch enough for it to fit snug but not tight. Style is on point- the off the shoulder look was great but kept rolling up at times and needed some consistent pulling down. Consider wearing flat or smooth shapewear underneath without any seams. Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality!
items.body: Very good quality and so pretty, very affordable Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ehh
items.body: I ended up returning this dress because the arm part kept folding up and would not stay down. I suppose this is something you could fix with fabric tape but I was not feeling the effort. The color was just as pictured. The fabric was nice and thick. Not see through. The fit was nice and snug, body con. I loved it. The only con was the off the shoulder fold down. Otherwise I would have kept. Read more
items.author: Hailee

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: I had high hopes because I saw a TikToker share this. You have got to have extreme confidence or a very fit and curvy body. I’m not flabby or considered overweight for my height but this was just not it. It showed every lump and bump. The shoulders were weird too-the material does not stay put with movement. Beautiful color though. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Whaley

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Formal Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Formal Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Navy, Wine Red, Pink, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
